name: PROHIBITION TIME©
description: “Prohibition Time” is an online multiplayer game. The game combines elements of the social deduction game “Mafia” (also known as “Werewolf”) extended by our team with cards and special actions.

name: MOONSOUP©
description: “Moonsoup” is a 2D simulator game about running a potion shop set in a medieval fantasy setting. The game combines logical puzzles and mini-games in a design that focuses on creating a casual and relaxing gameplay.

name: WHEN THE DUSK COMES©
description: “When the Dusk Comes” is a 2D advanced clicker game where the player tries to save as many people as possible before the apocalypse. The game combines a simple mechanic of button clicking with a broad system of saving humanity and its heritage and technology trees.

name: INTO INFERNO©
description: “Into Inferno” is a 6 player board game set in the world of Dante’s 'Divine Comedy'. The gameplay focuses on adapting the roguelike genre from video games by randomizing each game with a variety of cards that affect the current and next attempts to win.

name: COAL IN MY HEART©
description: “Coal in My Heart” is a 2D side-scrolling platformer game that mixes fighting system with survival mechanics. The player has to fight swarms of living icicles and snowflakes to reach the heating system, guarded by a boss who must be defeated to fix it.

name: RAZEM RPG©
description: “Razem” is a universal role-playing game system. It is based on a six-sided dice rolling system that adapts flexibly to different game settings, placing players in the story as protagonists.

name: CRITICAL FIGHTER©
description: “Critical Fighter” is a 3D top-down fighting game concept set in the Critical Role universe for up to 12 players. Each game can be different with random battlefields and a variety of characters.

name: SCYTHE OF TIME©
description: “Scythe of Time” is a 2D tactical game concept that explores planning mechanics. Each level has to be completed by planning movements beforehand while everything is frozen in time.
